original: Öhman, Karl Johan Robert, prakt, läkare, Norrköping, f. 13/7/98 i Sthlm av kyrkoh. Karl Ö. o. Davida Sylvan. G. m. Gerd Engström. Barn: Rolf f. 45. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 16, tysk läk:-ex. i Marburg an der Lalin 26, med. kand. 28 o. med. lic. 30 i Sthlm. E. läk. i Töreboda distr. 30, tf. andre und:läk. v. Hällnäs san. fem mån. 30-31, förordn. s. prov:läk. i ol. distr. somm. 31, assist :läk. v. Lidköp. las. kir. avd. åtta mån. 31-32, tf. und :läk. v. Filipstads las. 32, e. läk. v. Mariebergs sjukh. fyra mån. 32-33, prakt, läk. i Norrköp. sed. 33, tf. prov:läk. i Norrköp. distr. kort. tider 33-41, tf. andre stadsläk. i Norrköp. okt. 40-febr. 43. *Öhman, Sofia Lovisa, fil. mag., läroverksadjunkt, Norrköping, f. 21/7/92. — Stud:ex. H, fil. kand. 15, fil. mag. 16. Lär. v. Umeå folksk :sem. 15, i Lindesberg 16, i Malmberget 17, 18-20, i Tierp 20, ord. ämneslär. där 21, tf. bitr. förest. 3i2, bitr. förest. 33’, adj. i mo-dersm. o. eng. v. h. a. 1. i Norrköp. fr.
translated:
Öhman, Karl Johan Robert, prakt. (praktiserande) läkare (medical doctor), Norrköping, born 13/7/98 in Stockholm, son of reverend Karl Ö. and Davida Sylvan. Married to Gerd Engström. Children: Rolf, born in 1945. Completed high school in Stockholm in 1916, medical degree in Germany in Marburg an der Lahn in 1926, Bachelor of Medicine in Stockholm in 1928, and medical license in 1930 in Stockholm. Worked as a doctor in the Töreboda district in 1930, temporary senior physician at the Hällnäs sanatorium for five months in 1930-1931, appointed as a provisional doctor in various districts in the summer of 1931, assistant doctor at the surgical department of Lidköping hospital for eight months in 1931-1932, temporary junior doctor at Filipstad hospital in 1932, employed doctor at Marieberg hospital for four months in 1932-1933, and practicing doctor in Norrköping since 1933. Served as temporary provisional doctor in the Norrköping district for short periods between 1933 and 1941, and as temporary deputy city physician in Norrköping from October 1940 to February 1943. 

Öhman, Sofia Lovisa, fil. (filosofie) mag. (Master of Arts), high school teacher, Norrköping, born 21/7/92. Completed high school in H, Bachelor of Arts in 1915, and Master of Arts in 1916. Taught at Umeå public school seminar in 1915, in Lindesberg in 1916, in Malmberget in 1917 and 1920, and in Tierp in 1920. Became a regular subject teacher in Tierp in 1921, acting assistant supervisor in 1932, and deputy supervisor in 1933. Adjunct in mother tongue and English at H a. l. in Norrköping from [year missing].

Note: The abbreviation '\d\d m. partners name' means that the person married in the year 19xx.
